1   package org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.videotld;
2   
3   import java.io.File;
4   import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
5   import java.io.IOException;
6   import java.io.PrintStream;
7   
8   import javax.swing.JFrame;
9   import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
10  
11  import org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.TLD;
12  import org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.tldcpp.tracker.RectangleSelectionListener;
13  import org.openimaj.image.MBFImage;
14  import org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Rectangle;
15  import org.openimaj.video.Video;
16  import org.openimaj.video.VideoDisplay;
17  import org.openimaj.video.VideoDisplay.Mode;
18  import org.openimaj.video.capture.VideoCapture;
19  
20  public class TLDMain {
21  	public Video<MBFImage> source;
22  	TLD tld;
23  //	Gui * gui;
24  	boolean showOutput;
25  	File printResults;
26  	File saveDir;
27  	double threshold = 0.5;
28  	boolean showForeground = false;
29  	boolean showNotConfident;
30  	boolean selectManually;
31  	Rectangle initialBB;
32  	boolean reinit;
33  	boolean exportModelAfterRun;
34  	boolean loadModel;
35  	File modelPath;
36  	File modelExportFile;
37  	int seed;
38  	public PrintStream resultsFile;
39  	public VideoDisplay<MBFImage> disp;
40  	public RectangleSelectionListener selector;
41  	public Command command;
42  	boolean markerMode = false;
43  	public TLDMain(Video<MBFImage> imageSource){
44  		source = imageSource;
45  		tld = new TLD(imageSource.getWidth(),imageSource.getHeight());
46  	}
47  	void doWork() throws FileNotFoundException {
48  		if(printResults != null) {
49  			resultsFile = new PrintStream(printResults);
50  		}
51  		
52  		// Start a video processor
53  		selector = new RectangleSelectionListener(this);
54  		disp = VideoDisplay.createVideoDisplay(source);
55  		disp.addVideoListener(new TLDVideoListener(this));
56  		
57  		JFrame rootScreen = (JFrame) SwingUtilities.windowForComponent(disp.getScreen());
58  		rootScreen.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
59  		rootScreen.addKeyListener(new TLDKeyListener(this));
60  		disp.getScreen().addMouseListener(selector);
61  		disp.getScreen().addMouseMotionListener(selector);
62  	}
63  	public void initiateObjectSelect() {
64  		command = Command.SELECT;
65  	}
66  	public void selectObject(Rectangle r) throws Exception{
67  		this.tld.selectObject(this.source.getCurrentFrame().flatten(),r);
68  		this.disp.setMode(Mode.PLAY);
69  		
70  	}
71  	
72  	public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
73  		TLDMain tldMain = new TLDMain(new VideoCapture(320,240));
74  		TLDConfig.tldConfig(tldMain);
75  		tldMain.doWork();
76  	}
77  	public enum Command{
78  		NONE,CLEAR,LEARNING,ALTERNATING,SELECT;
79  	}
80  	public void queueClear() {
81  		command = Command.CLEAR;
82  	}
83  	public void toggleLearning() {
84  		command = Command.LEARNING;
85  		
86  	}
87  	public void toggleAlternating() {
88  		command = Command.ALTERNATING;
89  		
90  	}
91  	public void toggleMarkerMode() {
92  		this.markerMode  = !markerMode;
93  	}
94  }
